name: Ghostkeeper (MtWhateverest)
description:
You were hired by a mysterious man to catch some ghosts in a cemetery. Catch them all and you will be rewarded...

Controls: WASD and Spacebar, Mouse to look around.

Esc to Pause, R to Restart

Best played on the windows version.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

All assets, code, and music made by me, with the help of some tutorials ;)
